name: ImageMath
author: ANTs Developers
description: A versatile tool for performing various mathematical and manipulation operations on images.

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: The dimensionality of the image. Use 2 or 3 for spatial images, and 4 for 4D images like time-series data.

inputs.name: Operations and Inputs
inputs.description: Mathematical operations and inputs to be applied on the images.

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: The output image file resulting from the operations.

inputs.name: Image 1
inputs.description: The first input image for the operation.

inputs.name: Image 2
inputs.description: The second input image for the operation, if required.
